signatures.text: inline fun <T> Comparator<T>.thenBy( crossinline selector: (T) -> Comparable<*>?): Comparator<T>
signatures.desc: Creates a comparator comparing values after the primary comparator defined them equal. It uses the function to transform value to a Comparable instance for comparison.

signatures.text: inline fun <T, K> Comparator<T>.thenBy( comparator: Comparator<in K>, crossinline selector: (T) -> K): Comparator<T>
signatures.desc: Creates a comparator comparing values after the primary comparator defined them equal. It uses the selector function to transform values and then compares them with the given comparator.
